00038 class MEShowNodesWindow : public Gtk::Window {
00039    public:
00045       static MEShowNodesWindow* instance(MEMapArea* mapArea) {
00046          if (m_theTurnDesciptionsWindow == NULL) {
00047             // No existing window
00048             m_theTurnDesciptionsWindow = 
00049                manage(new MEShowNodesWindow(mapArea));         
00050          } else if (m_theTurnDesciptionsWindow->m_mapArea != mapArea) {
00051             delete m_theTurnDesciptionsWindow;
00052             m_theTurnDesciptionsWindow = 
00053                manage(new MEShowNodesWindow(mapArea));         
00054          }
00055          return m_theTurnDesciptionsWindow;
00056       }
00057 
00061       virtual ~MEShowNodesWindow();
